trans-unit.source: Defines the metadata attribute that Web server controls use to indicate support for event validation.
trans-unit.target: 定义元数据特性，Web 服务器控件使用它来表明支持事件验证。

trans-unit.source: Event validation prevents forged postbacks to an ASP.NET Web page and can be enabled through the `EnableEventValidation` page directive.
trans-unit.target: 事件验证禁止伪造回发到 ASP.NET 网页，可以通过启用`EnableEventValidation`页面指令。

trans-unit.source: For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you do not define the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.SupportsEventValidationAttribute" /> attribute, your custom control does not automatically participate in event validation.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.SupportsEventValidationAttribute" />属性，自定义控件不自动参与事件验证。

trans-unit.source: However, your control can explicitly call <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.ValidateEvent(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你的控件可以显式调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.ValidateEvent(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: If you handle event registration and validation, call <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.ValidateEvent(System.String)" />, and then you do not need to define this attribute on the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你处理事件注册和验证，则调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager.ValidateEvent(System.String)" />，，然后不需要此属性定义控件上。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.SupportsEventValidationAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.SupportsEventValidationAttribute" /> 类的新实例。
